title: Serif Companion for FB Agenda?
content:
Hi Folks,

Suggestions for a serif companion for FB Agenda? I will be using FB Agenda for headings and sub-headings in Reports. I'm looking for a serif to use for the body text.

Many Thanks

[http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Agenda](http://web.archive.org/web/20110512152231/http:/www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Agenda "http://www.fontbureau.com/fonts/Agenda")
author: JB01

comments.content: What kinds of reports for what kind of company?

That's a pretty clumbsy sans serif for a report. It would have a tendency to obviscate any serif face that go with it. Try to stay away from novelty display fonts unless you're doing a logo.  
Dr. Type

\>pretty clumbsy sans serif  
\>stay away from novelty display fonts

Huh? Did you click on the link? Are we looking at the same thing?

Stephen,

An architectural firm; the reports will deal with long-range planning strategies ... more text than pictures ...

Thx

I think Stephen's suggestions are pretty good. I'd also look at some Bodoni or other for architecturally themed uses.

Cheers!
